did.unittitle: Katherine Anne Porter, New Orleans, to John H. [Birss], New York, New York [1937 Dec 15]

scopecontent.p: [Includes autograph notes by both correspondents; lists Porter's published works; comments on upcoming publication of Pale Horse, Pale Rider, [Barrett] Wendell's biography of Cotton Mather and his involvement in the Salem witchcraft trials.]

did.unittitle: Katherine Anne Porter, New York, New York, to Mr. Armitage 1950 Nov 7

scopecontent.p: [Comments on [Ezra] "Pound question" and humankind's tendency to periodically "groval in the wallow"; describes the passing-on of culture of her pioneer ancestors and the necessity to defend it in order to live in freedom.]

did.unittitle: Katherine Anne Porter, [Ann Arbor, Michigan], to H. H. Rappaport, Brooklyn, New York 1954 Apr 13

scopecontent.p: [Thanks him for the gift of a much-read copy of one of her books and for the "good human impulse that brought it here."]

did.unittitle: Katherine Anne Porter, [Ann Arbor, Michigan], to H. A. Rappaport, Brooklyn, New York 1954 May 12

scopecontent.p: [Encloses recent picture; comments on his and his wife's health; expresses appreciation of gift of book.]

did.unittitle: Katherine Anne Porter, Brussels, Belgium, to H. A. Rappaport, Brooklyn, New York 1955 Feb 8

scopecontent.p: [Apologizes for delay in writing due to work at the University of Michigan, lectures in the United States, preparation for a year in Europe as a Fullbright lecturer, a holiday in England, Rome and Paris, and illness of several weeks from which she is recovering; describes Brussels, where she is headquartered; thanks him for gift of Flowering Judas.]

did.unittitle: Katherine Anne Porter, North Woods, Connecticut, to Mr. and Mrs. H. A. Rappaport, Brooklyn, New York 1955 Dec [14]

scopecontent.p: [Thanks them for gift of new edition of "a [bright particular faith ?]"; calls attention to the homemade card.]

did.unittitle: Katherine Anne Porter, Southbury, to Clifton Waller Barrett 1957 Nov 19

scopecontent.p: [Hopes he will see her play which will open in early December at the Jan Hus Auditorium "God willing"; compares the uncertainty of theater to the "Safe Harbor" of writing.]

did.unittitle: Katherine Anne Porter, Southbu[ry], to Waller and Cornelia Barrett, New York, New York 1957 Dec
Katherine Anne Porter to Monroe Wheeler 1960 Dec 27

scopecontent.p: [Excerpts of a letter discussing her love for him; contrasts to clingy demanding love of others she has experienced; refers to her writing, her wealth of ideas, most of which are over 25 years old; discusses the process of writing "Flowering Judas," difficulty of communicating this approach to students; mentions working on 2 stories one of which is "Vision of Heaven by Fra Angelico."]

did.unittitle: Clifton Waller Barrett to Monroe Wheeler, New York, New York 1961 Feb 13

scopecontent.p: [Thanks him for excerpts of letter from Katherine Anne Porter dated December 27, 1960.]

did.unittitle: Katherine Anne Porter, head and shoulders 1954 May 12
